article:

    Start fast --    _  to job postings in a timely manner. Employers are making their  _  decisions a lot faster these days. Use the application process,  as opposed to  the interview, as your first step in the door -- and make it count.  _  online instructions and employer requirements carefully. Include  _  on
your resume  that will enhance your chances of being identified by recruiters  conducting     _  searches. Make sure you spell them  _  ; job search programs

    Demonstrate through your resume that there is a candidate-job match. Clearly communicate your skills and qualifications     _  they relate to the job profile.

    You only have one chance to make a first impression. Avoid the deadly     _  resume
